PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08602018-06-21,  PCH,  NCC,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectAcquisition of property ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (NCC) acquire the property located at 493 WELLINGTON STREET, Ottawa, Ontario. The property consists of 2,130 square metres of land and will be acquired from the City of Ottawa on terms satisfactory to the NCC.
AttachmentsAttachment
